name: Trello Slim Boards Drawer
description: This is a style for Trello. It makes the Boards Drawer (the sidebar) slimmer and more stylish. It's especially useful when setting the Board Drawer to always stay open. This style is based on Trello Mamselle by dasproduktiv but only styles the Boards Drawer, leaving the main area background customizable.
additional_info:
This style only affects the Board Drawer. My screenshot shows other Userstyles active:
Trello: Multiple rows (responsive)
Trello: "Add a new list" becomes plus icon
Trello: Add label text (no shadow)
